name: A NEW BEGINNING (SILAS.HUGHES)
description:
The end of one character, the beginning of another

-----------------------A BRACKEY'S 2023.1 SUBMISSION-------------------------

This is a game that was made in 5 days for the Brackey's 2023.1 GameJam! It's the first game I've ever released before, and I'm super proud of it :) There were hard times, and successful times. But overall, I had an absolute BLAST! 

I hope you enjoy :)

(controls are in the help menu btw) 

(Something I forgot to mention in the help menu is that the triangles double jump stops all momentum) :)
